intro: Androcymbium schimperianum, commonly known as the Schimper's sandwort, is a low-growing perennial plant native to arid and semi-arid regions of southern Africa. Androcymbium schimperianum is adapted to survive in nutrient-poor soils and can tolerate high levels of sunlight and temperature fluctuations.
